description: Droidcam plugin for OBS Studio Flatpak. This is not the Droidcam standalone app for Linux, that can be downloaded and compiled from dev47apps.com Note also, Droidcam standalone and OBS Studio's virtual camera function incompatible with each other, both trying to interface with (I think) v4l2loopback and so OBS Studio reports can't start virtualcam even when Doidcam standalone not running.
Can someone please give me instructions on how to use this app with the Seck?
